mapper.select: SELECT donation_available FROM MILE_WALLET WHERE WALLET_SEQ = #{walletSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE MILE_WALLET SET DONATION_AVAILABLE = DONATION_AVAILABLE + #{amount}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE WALLET_SEQ = #{walletSeq}
UPDATE MILE_WALLET SET DONATED_MILES = DONATED_MILES + #{amount}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE WALLET_SEQ = #{walletSeq}
UPDATE MILE_WALLET SET RECEIVED_MILES = RECEIVED_MILES + #{amount}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE WALLET_SEQ = #{walletSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT c.course_seq AS courseSeq, c.title AS courseTitle, u.user_seq AS instructorUserSeq, u.nickname AS instructorNickname, mw.wallet_seq AS instructorWalletSeq FROM course c JOIN users u ON c.user_seq = u.user_seq LEFT JOIN mile_wallet mw ON u.user_seq = mw.user_seq WHERE c.course_seq = #{courseSeq}
